channel.title: cloudengineering on Chetan Singh
channel.description: Recent content in cloudengineering on Chetan Singh

item.title: AWS IAM
item.description: Through this blog post series I’ll talk about organizing AWS IAM following industry best practices and AWS recommendations. This series will also cover centralizing identity management and integrating AWS SSO with Gsuite. Thus, helping organizations and teams manage their IAM easily and more efficiently. The series will talk about the following services and technologies AWS Organizations AWS SSO Gsuite

item.title: GCP Chaos Engineering
item.description: This will be a series of blog posts where I’ll share my experience working with different Chaos Engineering platforms available in the market and their use cases with Google Cloud Platform. I’ll talk about the following platforms Litmus Gremlin Chaos Mesh

item.title: GCP Networking Best Practices
item.description: This blog post series will cover real life use cases while designing networks in GCP cloud. I’ll also talk about networking best practices for GKE(Google Kubernetes Engine)
